PHPSpec_Object_Interrogator $_interrogator = null (line 36)

Interrogator object utilised to mediate between the DSL and an Object value being specified.

  • access: protected

Redefinition of:
PHPSpec_Specification::__get()
Very similar to __call(), simply diverts property requests to relevant methods (which allows the dropping of method braces) or returns an instance of self. So "$spec->be" equates to "$spec->be()".
